group_1.textLeft: Feeling better now...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, thanks... @That helps...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102102:lipSynch_1]I'm glad that you made it back... @Thank you so much.

group_1.textRight: I heard you went through a rough patch, too...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Everyone gathered here now is all that remains of @Torayamachi.
I'm a Janomiya girl, though~
So, what'd you call us over for? You sounded like @you were in a hurry over the phone.

group_1.textRight: There'll obviously be a big commotion if this @girl just shows up at home after all this time.
And she'll probably end up in the hospital for a while.
So she wanted to tell us something before that.

group_1.textLeft: What happened while you were away...?

group_1.textRight: My phone broke and I ran out of funds.
The cops wouldn't lend me any money, and @strangers are scary.
I got into so much trouble...
I even thought about getting myself on the news so I could get taken home in a police car.
That doesn't matter right now, though... @There's something more important I have to tell you.

group_1.textLeft: You mean...you found out...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
First, take a look at this.

group_1.textLeft: What's...with that outfit...?

group_1.textRight: While I was chasing that Witch, I ended up in a city called Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: That's that booming city that suffered a huge @disaster recently, right...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
There was an organization in the city called the @Wings of the Magius, and they wore robes like this...

group_1.textLeft: An organization...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, formed and run by Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: What were they doing...?

group_1.narration: "Their objective was the liberation of Magical Girls. @In other words, to save them from their fate @of becoming Witches."
"To do that, they protected the Rumors of the city and @captured Witches."
"No one used a single Grief Seed there,"
"but instead of turning into Witches, they were able to @summon what was called a "Doppel"."
"The city had become a haven for Magical Girls, @where you'll never turn into a Witch, @even if you don't fight any."
"I joined the group as a Black Feather, one of the @low-level members, so I wasn't told exactly how everything @worked. I was just a pawn for the sake of liberation."
"I didn't find out until the day that Eve went out of @control and Walpurgisnacht arrived in the city, which @caused the disaster you mentioned."
"After that, the Magius fell apart, and all of their secrets were @revealed. That was when I learned the truth..."

group_1.textCenter: For the sake of their salvation, they lured Witches @to the city from all across the country!

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*?!

group_1.textCenter: They weren't thinking about what might happen to Magical Girls in other cities.
They were just thoughtlessly gathering Witches for themselves!

group_1.textLeft: ...The other Magical Girls in the organization... @Were they okay with that?

group_1.textRight: The truth had been hidden until the organization collapsed, and all of the Black Feathers were pretty weak.
So I think everyone was focused more on saving themselves than the fate of other cities...
Plus, if their system had been successful, it was supposed to spread across the entire country.
Which means all the other Magical Girls would've @been saved by the time they got back to their @hometowns...

group_1.textLeft: So, are things different now...?
Are we never gonna turn into Witches here @in Futatsugi...?

group_1.textRight: The liberation plan was stopped by another group @of Magical Girls who knew the risk
that it would create a horrible Witch and involve hundreds of thousands of casualties.

group_1.textLeft: THAT many people could've died...? That would've @been a massacre...
Was there no way to get around it...?

group_1.textRight: But the system is still active in Kamihama.
And we gained NOTHING for what we'd lost to @create it!
They destroyed their city and sacrificed so many @people and Magical Girls!
And they're the ONLY ones who benefitted from it!
Yuna...!
I can't stand it... I just can't...!
Hey, what's wrong...?

group_1.textLeft: So this is what it feels like to want to kill someone...

group_1.textRight: Yuna...

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru...

group_1.textRight: A-aye...

group_1.textLeft: Call Juri out to Monzenbashi.

group_1.textRight: B-but Yuna, you're...

group_1.textLeft: Do it now!

group_1.textRight: Aye!

group_1.textLeft: Ao...
I need some proof about Kamihama.
Go find Kyubey and bring it to me.
You said before that you didn't know where it was,
but you should know now.

group_1.textRight: Um... I'm a Janomiya member, though~

group_1.textLeft: Ao...

group_1.textRight: ....O-okay, right away~

group_1.textLeft: Now, I need you to tell me more.
What are the Magical Girls in Kamihama doing @at present...?

group_1.textRight: The Magius and the girls who stopped them have started working together.

group_1.textLeft: They're playing nice with each other so that they @can remain safe from turning into Witches...?

group_1.textRight: I heard they want to share their "Automatic @Purification System" with the rest of the world.

group_1.textLeft: How very idealistic.

group_1.textCenter: Yuna... Are we going to help them do that?

group_1.textRight: No way...

group_1.narration: "The voices of the girls we lost...are echoing @inside of my head right now..."
